title: Microlearning Course for Diagnosing and Enhancing Competencies in Virtual Educational Material Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ability to utilize digital tools and experience in developing educational materials
context.additional_context: A course diagnosing competency in developing virtual educational materials in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments and acquiring ICT integration strategies and learner-customized design methods.

learning_goals: Learners can establish content structures reflecting learner characteristic analysis when designing virtual educational materials.
Learners can produce prototypes by applying mobile-optimized microlearning material development procedures.
Learners can verify the feasibility of ICT-integrated educational strategies through project-based assessments.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
